definition: between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Community structure of Chitons in the Rocky Intertidal Zone of Islands in South Zhejiang were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了浙南島嶼巖相潮間帶石鱉的羣落結構。

sentences.english: Community structure of mussels in the rocky intertidal zone of the Beiji islands in south Zhejiang was studied.
sentences.chinese: 報導了北麂列島巖相潮間帶貽貝類的羣落結構。

sentences.english: The latter was dominant at subtidal. area, but fewer at intertidal area.
sentences.chinese: 後者則是亞潮帶的優勢種，但在潮間帶數量較少。

sentences.english: The distribution trend of heavy metal in tidal sediment of Jinzhou Bay is increasing from inshore to sea.
sentences.chinese: 潮間帶表層沉積物重金屬的分佈由近岸向海升高。

sentences.english: It is found that Ceramium spp and Gracilaria verrucosa become the chief dominant species in the red algal community during May.
sentences.chinese: 煙臺海域基岩潮間帶紅藻羣落的優勢種爲仙菜和江籬。

sentences.english: The gypsum deposit has in higher intertidal flat of the suprat- ndal and intertidal zone.
sentences.chinese: 石膏礦牀形成於潮上帶及潮間帶高潮坪。

sentences.english: The owl limpet (Lottia gigantean) which clings to rocks in the ocean intertidal zone has a "right-handed" body organization.
sentences.chinese: 是一種右旋的生活在海洋潮間帶岩石上的螺。

definition: Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
Tuku town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4
